raw: Canada Suspends Parliament After Moving to Ratify New Nafta .
replaced: Canada Suspends Parliament After Moving to Ratify New Nafta .

raw: Canada ’s lawmakers are working to tie up loose ends in Ottawa after suspending the House of Commons on Friday , the latest step in the country ’s efforts to control the spread of the coronavirus .
replaced: Canada ’s lawmakers are working to tie up loose ends in Ottawa after suspending The House of Commons on Friday , the latest step in Canada ’s efforts to control the spread of the coronavirus .

raw: With Prime Minister Justin Trudeau governing from home after his wife Sophie Gregoire Trudeau tested positive for Covid-19 , lawmakers voted unanimously to shutter the legislature until April 20 .
replaced: With Prime Minister Justin Trudeau governing from home after Prime Minister Justin Trudeau wife Sophie Gregoire Trudeau tested positive for Covid-19 , lawmakers The motion unanimously to shutter Parliament until April 20 .

raw: The motion included a provision that passed the new North American trade deal with the U.S. and Mexico in Canada ’s lower house .
replaced: The motion included a provision that passed The trade deal  Canada ’s lower house .

raw: The Senate met later Friday to approve the deal , the final legislative step before formal ratification , Deputy Prime Minister Chrystia Freeland told reporters in Ottawa .
replaced: The Senate met later Friday to approve The trade deal , Deputy Prime Minister Chrystia Freeland told reporters in Ottawa .

raw: Canada is the final holdout on approving the deal , known as CUSMA domestically , after a year and a half of tough negotiations with President Donald Trump ’s administration .
replaced: Canada is the final holdout on approving The trade deal  The trade deal domestically , after a year and a half of tough negotiations with President Donald Trump ’s administration .

raw: Canadian lawmakers previously voiced concerns over provisions in the new Nafta that could give the U.S. veto rights on future Canadian trade accords with other countries , as well as a new dairy export tariff and the treatment of aluminum versus steel .
replaced: Canadian lawmakers previously voiced concerns over provisions in the new Nafta that could give the U.S. veto rights on future Canadian trade accords with other countries , as well as a new dairy export tariff and the treatment of aluminum versus steel .

raw: The trade deal is key for Canada ’s economy and regulates at least $ 1 trillion worth of commerce in the North American market of more than half a billion consumers .
replaced: The trade deal is key for Canada ’s economy and regulates at least $ 1 trillion worth of commerce in the North American market of more than half a billion consumers .

raw: Finance Minister Bill Morneau , under pressure to deliver more spending amid the coronavirus crisis , has been calling bank economists to get advice on potential measures to support the nation ’s economy .
replaced: Rodriguez , under pressure to deliver more spending amid the coronavirus crisis , has been calling bank economists to get advice on potential measures to support Canada ’s economy .

raw: He had been expected to deliver the budget on March 30 , but that may be delayed , Rodriguez said .
replaced: Rodriguez had been expected to that the budget on April 20 , but that may be delayed , Rodriguez said .

raw: The House of Commons is set to resume sitting on April 20 .
replaced: The House of Commons is set to resume sitting on April 20 .
